description: This Python source file demonstrates the use of asynchronous functions and hooks within a tool-based agent framework. It defines a custom toolkit for customer database operations, a validation hook for pre- and post-processing, and executes sample agent responses asynchronously.

classes.name: CustomerDBTools
classes.description: A toolkit class extending Toolkit, providing methods to retrieve and delete customer profiles, registered as tools for the agent.

methods.name: retrieve_customer_profile
methods.description: Asynchronous method to retrieve a customer profile from the database, returning a JSON string with customer details.

methods.name: delete_customer_profile
methods.description: Method to delete a customer profile from the database, returning a confirmation string.

methods.name: validation_hook
methods.description: An asynchronous hook function that validates and logs calls to customer profile methods, raising errors for specific customer IDs.
